Artist working in many different styles and mediums. I paint what is in the moment with what I have on hand. the dominant paradigm is what was once the avant-garde. Now the art world is oversaturated with abstract, ready made and conceptual art.

I love to make art for the love of art not some jumped up linguistic nonsense. I love brushwork, color and ideas but prefer to create things that don't require three phd's to interpret.

note: Author. Scientist. Host of PBS Serving Up Science. ‘24-25 International Affairs Fellow in the U.S. Senate. Sustainability, Politics & Science Communication. #HistoryRemix for stories of diverse trailblazers in science & the arts. #SharedPlanet to explore biodiversity

This is the official Mastodon account for Democrats Abroad, the Democratic Party arm for the millions of Americans living outside the US. We strive to provide Americans abroad with a Democratic voice in our government and to elect Democratic candidates by mobilizing the overseas vote.

If you're a US citizen who lives abroad, YOU CAN VOTE in the upcoming #2024Election.

To register, or get overseas voting information for your state, go to http://VoteFromAbroad.org.

We post daily.
